other.searchWasFoundReadTheRules:
**Chat was found!**

Chat rules:
```1. Do not abuse obscene language
2. Treat yourself and the other person with due respect```
System notifications are displayed as embeds
**List of commands available during the chat**:
`!stop` - quit the chat
`!report` - send a report to the interlocutor
`!deanon` - invite the other person to reveal your nicknames
`!stop-search` - quit the chat and start the search
errors.youAreNotInTheChat: You are not in the chat!
errors.youAlreadyInTheChat: You are already in the chat!
errors.banned:
Unfortunately, you were banned.
If you think that your blocking is groundless , contact the administration on [this]({{contactServerInvite}}) server and write why you think so.
errors.youHaveBeenSendedReportInThisChat: You have already sent a report in this chat!
errors.guildSearchUnavaliableChangeTheSe:
**Server search is not possible from direct messages!**
To fix this problem, use the command to change the value of the search setting `{{prefix}}config 3 no` or start searching on a server.
errors.cantSendMessage:
Unfortunately, the bot can 't send you a message.
Check your privacy settings.
errors.noLinksInTheChat: You can't send links in the chat!
errors.noSuchGender:
There is no such gender!
Specify `no`, `female`, or `male`
errors.functionNotAvaliableInviteBot:
**Unfortunately, this feature will only be available only after the number of bot users exceeds 20,000.**

To view the current number of users, write the command `n!stats`
To get an invitation link for a bot, use the command `{{prefix}}invite`
errors.theseOptionAreNotAvaliable: There is no setting with this number!
errors.youAlreadyVotedForDeanon: You have already voted for deanon!
errors.chatTimeout: The chat was terminated due to lack of activity for 5 minutes.
errors.searchTimeout:
Unfortunately, the interlocutor was not found for 15 minutes.
To start the search again, write `n!search`
commands.help.args.command.desc: The command you want to get a detailed description of
commands.help.DMprefixDisclaimer: Commands that start with `!` , can only be used in private messages

commands.prefix.currentPrefixMessage: Current bot prefix on this server: `{{currentPrefix}}`

commands.report.reportDisclaimer: Please note that if you send a report without valid reasons, you will be issued a warning.

Your conversation partner was banned.

The chat search was canceled.

commands.language.desc: Change the language or find out the current one
commands.language.thisLanguageDoesNotExi: There is no such language! Use one of these: {{languages}}
commands.language.languageHasChanged: The language was changed successfully! Current language: {{language}}
commands.deanon.desc: Invite the other person to reveal your nicknames
commands.deanon.youOfferedDeanon: You asked the other person to reveal your nicknames.
commands.deanon.deanonOffer:
The interlocutor offers you to reveal your nicknames
To accept the offer, write `!deanon`
commands.config.howToSetNewValue: To set new value, use {{prefix}}config <number of option> <new value>
commands.valueHasChanged: Value of setting "{{option}}" is now equals: "{{value}}"
